1.0.name: wordpress/link-to-words-in-posts
1.0.description:
This Plugin will help wordpress posts editors to add links to any keywords in the selected post from a simple panel.This will help the bloggers to linking the keywords from simple panel with all attributes of a link.

  • This plugin will only add links to keywords with few attributes.
  • This plugin will add links to keywords as many time as keyword occurs in a selected post.
  • Title of Link can be added.
  • Relative Attribute can be set as per need.
  • Target of the link can be set using the same panel.

Updates for more links attributes are comming soon.
